entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
